CustomField.formula: IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c,"Assigned"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c,"Reassigned")),OR(OwnerId=$User.Id,Apttus_Approval__PrevAssignedToId__c=$User.Id,CONTAINS(Apttus_Approval__DelegateApproverIds__c, $User.Id),$Profile.Name="System Administrator",$Profile.Name="Apttus Standard User")),IF(OR($User.UITheme == 'Theme4d',$User.UITheme == 'Theme4u'),HYPERLINK("/one/one.app#/alohaRedirect/apex/Apttus_Approval__ApprovalSummaryLaunch?id="&Id&"&pageMode=reassign","Reassign"&BR(),"_self"),HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Approval__ApprovalSummaryLaunch?id="&Id&"&pageMode=reassign","Reassign"&BR(),"_self")),NULL) & IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c,"Assigned"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c,"Reassigned")),OR(OwnerId=$User.Id,Apttus_Approval__PrevAssignedToId__c=$User.Id,CONTAINS(Apttus_Approval__DelegateApproverIds__c, $User.Id),$Profile.Name="System Administrator",$Profile.Name="Apttus Standard User")),IF(OR($User.UITheme == 'Theme4d',$User.UITheme == 'Theme4u'),HYPERLINK("/one/one.app#/alohaRedirect/apex/Apttus_Approval__ApprovalSummaryLaunch?id="&Id&"&pageMode=approveReject","Approve / Reject"&BR(),"_self"),HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Approval__ApprovalSummaryLaunch?id="&Id&"&pageMode=approveReject","Approve / Reject"&BR(),"_self")),NULL) & IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c,"Assigned"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c,"Reassigned")),IF(OR($User.UITheme == 'Theme4d',$User.UITheme == 'Theme4u'),HYPERLINK("/one/one.app#/alohaRedirect/apex/Apttus_Approval__ApprovalSummaryLaunch?id="&Id&"&pageMode=addComment","Add Comment"&BR(),"_self"),HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Approval__ApprovalSummaryLaunch?id="&Id&"&pageMode=addComment","Add Comment"&BR(),"_self")),NULL) & IF(AND(Apttus_Approval__CanEscalate__c,OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c,"Assigned"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c ,"Reassigned")),OR(Apttus_Approval__Initial_Submitter__c=$User.Id,$Profile.Name="System Administrator")),IF(OR($User.UITheme == 'Theme4d',$User.UITheme == 'Theme4u'),HYPERLINK("/one/one.app#/alohaRedirect/apex/Apttus_Approval__ApprovalRequestEscalate?id="&Id,"Escalate","_self"),HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Approval__ApprovalRequestEscalate?id="&Id,"Escalate","_self")),NULL)
CustomField.label: Approval Action
